name: Kill all zombies
description:
So guys!!!!! So this is my first game that I have made in my life. I have made this game to entertain you all. Play this game and rate this game.

So in this game there is a player and he have to kill the all the zombies  and he has to survive. There are many guns and very dangerous zombies so take care!!!!

and now download the game  have fun good luck!!! 

Instructions-

System requirements-

Processor-intel core i5 2th  generation   

Ram-4GB 3200mhz Speed

Graphics card-2gb intel UHD graphics

OS-windows7,8,8.1 and windows10

Space-700mb free hard disk space
